summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Stage 2 patch for restin.ai. Backend APIs fully functional with three real Marvin Gauci Group venues. All Stage 2 features verified: venue-specific menus with allergens, PIN 1234 authentication, floor setup with zones/tables, and venue scoping working correctly.

integration_issues.issue: Frontend sessions appear to timeout quickly, causing redirects back to login screen during extended testing

passed_tests: Three Real Venues Present (Caviar & Bull, Don Royale, Sole by Tarragon)
Menu Items with Allergens (18/24 items in Caviar & Bull, 19/30 in Don Royale, 23/30 in Sole by Tarragon)
Venue Scoping (Menu items properly isolated per venue)
Floor Setup with Zones and Tables per Venue
Caviar & Bull: 6 zones, 18 tables (Main Dining, Terrace, Private Room, Champagne Bar, Kitchen, Pass)
Don Royale: 5 zones, 23 tables (Main Floor, Lounge, Bar, Grill Kitchen, Pass)
Sole by Tarragon: 4 zones, 18 tables (Main Dining, Sea Terrace, Aperitivo Bar, Kitchen)
Admin Dashboard Loading with Venue-Specific Stats
Stage 2 Specific API Tests (15/15 tests passed)
Venue Configuration Display (Fine Dining type, Course Pacing, Review Policy)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (Core Stage 2 functionality working, minor session timeout issue)
